foreignData.name: Macht jenseits der Vernunft
foreignData.text:
Lege zwei +1/+1-Marken auf eine Kreatur deiner Wahl.
Delirium — Lege stattdessen drei +1/+1-Marken auf diese Kreatur, falls dein Friedhof vier oder mehr unterschiedliche Kartentypen enthält.

foreignData.name: Fuerza más allá de la razón
foreignData.text:
Pon dos contadores +1/+1 sobre la criatura objetivo.
Delirio — En vez de eso, pon tres contadores +1/+1 sobre esa criatura si entre las cartas de tu cementerio hay cuatro o más tipos de cartas.

foreignData.name: Puissance déraisonnable
foreignData.text:
Mettez deux marqueurs +1/+1 sur la créature ciblée.
Délire — Mettez trois marqueurs +1/+1 sur cette créature à la place s'il y a au moins quatre types de carte parmi les cartes de votre cimetière.

foreignData.name: Potenza Irrazionale
foreignData.text:
Metti due segnalini +1/+1 su una creatura bersaglio.
Delirio — Metti invece tre segnalini +1/+1 su quella creatura se ci sono quattro o più tipi di carta tra le carte nel tuo cimitero.

foreignData.name: 道理を超えた力
foreignData.text:
クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それの上に＋１/＋１カウンターを２個置く。
昂揚 ― あなたの墓地にあるカードにカード・タイプが合計４種類以上含まれるなら、代わりに、そのクリーチャーの上に＋１/＋１カウンターを３個置く。

foreignData.name: 설명할 수 없는 힘
foreignData.text:
생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물에 +1/+1 카운터 두 개를 올려놓는다.
섬망 — 당신의 무덤에 네 개 이상의 카드 유형이 있다면, 대신 그 생물에 +1/+1 카운터 세 개를 놓는다.

foreignData.name: Força Além da Razão
foreignData.text:
Coloque dois marcadores +1/+1 na criatura alvo.
Delírio — Em vez disso, coloque três marcadores +1/+1 naquela criatura se houver quatro ou mais tipos de card entre os cards de seu cemitério.

foreignData.name: Немыслимая Мощь
foreignData.text:
Положите два жетона +1/+1 на целевое существо.
Буйство — Положите вместо этого три жетона +1/+1 на то существо, если среди карт на вашем кладбище есть не менее четырех типов карт.

foreignData.name: 非常理之力
foreignData.text:
在目标生物上放置两个+1/+1指示物。
躁狂～如果你坟墓场中牌的类别有四种或更多，则改为在该生物上放置三个+1/+1指示物。

foreignData.name: 非常理之力
foreignData.text:
在目標生物上放置兩個+1/+1指示物。
躁狂～如果你墳墓場中牌的類別有四種或更多，則改為在該生物上放置三個+1/+1指示物。

name: Might Beyond Reason
originalText:
Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.
Delirium — Put three +1/+1 counters on that creature instead if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

rulings.text: The card types in Magic are artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal (a card type that appears on some older cards). Supertypes (such as legendary and basic) and subtypes (such as Human and Equipment) are not counted.
The number of card types matters, not the number of cards. For example, Wicker Witch (an artifact creature) along with Catalog (an instant) and Chaplain’s Blessing (a sorcery) will enable delirium.
Because you consider only the characteristics of a double-faced card’s front face while it’s not on the battlefield, the types of its back face won’t be counted for delirium.

In some rare cases, you can have a token or a copy of a spell in your graveyard at the moment that an object’s delirium ability counts the card types among cards in your graveyard, before that token or copy ceases to exist. Because tokens and copies of spells are not cards, even if they are copies of cards, their types will never be counted.

Some delirium abilities that appear on instants and sorceries use the word “instead.” These spells have an upgraded effect when they resolve if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard. They check that number only while they’re resolving and don’t count themselves, since they aren’t in your graveyard yet. You only get the upgraded effect, not both effects.

text:
Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.
Delirium — Put three +1/+1 counters on that creature instead if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
